abstract: Pete Wells reviews The Clocktower restaurant in New York Edition hotel in Midtown Manhattan.
lead_paragraph: The Clocktower, in the New York Edition hotel, is a Stephen Starr restaurant with the English chef Jason Atherton in the kitchen.

headline.main: Restaurant Review: The Clocktower in Midtown South
headline.print_headline: At the Top of the Stairs, a Promise Delivered

snippet: The Clocktower, in the New York Edition hotel, is a Stephen Starr restaurant with the English chef Jason Atherton in the kitchen.
